testcase.name: Create Room - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given "https://medunna.com" web adresine gidilir............................passed When User simgesine tiklanir................................................passed And Sign in secenegine tiklanir.............................................passed And Username kutusuna kullanici adi girilir.................................passed And Password kutusuna password girilir......................................passed And Sign in butonuna tiklanir...............................................passed When Items&Titles secenegine tiklanir.......................................passed And Room secenegine tiklanir................................................passed And Create a new Room butonuna tiklanir.....................................passed And Room Number kutusuna bir oda_no girilir.................................passed And Room Type menusunden SUITE secenegi secilir.............................passed And Status kontrol kutusuna tiklanir........................................passed And Price kutusuna "123" degeri girilir.....................................passed And Description kutusuna bir "End To End Test için oluşturulmuştur" girilir.passed And Save butonuna tiklanir..................................................passed And Uygulama kapatilir......................................................passed
